alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued October 17 at 8:53PM MDT until October 18 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwestern and southwestern South Dakota. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Cheyenne River Reservation. * WHEN...Until 3 PM MDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foothills; Ziebach
